\newcommand{\theMetaDocId}{123-444-jaja}%%_PATCH_%_ID_%%
\newcommand{\theMetaIssCode}{01}%%_PATCH_%_ISSUE_%%
\newcommand{\theMetaRevCode}{00}%%_PATCH_%_REVISION_%%
\newcommand{\theMetaIssRev}{Iss \theMetaIssCode, Rev \theMetaRevCode}
\newcommand{\theMetaDate}{PUBLICATIONDATE}%%_PATCH_%_DATE_%%
\newcommand{\theMetaPropInfo}{Or Maybe Footer}%%_PATCH_%_FRAME_%_NOTE_%%
